mapper.select: SELECT employee_id, name AS employeeName, department AS employeeDepartment, position AS employeePostion, email AS employeeEmail, phone_number AS employeePhoneNumber, created_at AS employeeDateOfJoin FROM employee_directory ORDER BY created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE employee_directory SET name = #{employeeName}, department = #{employeeDepartment}, position = #{employeePostion}, email = #{employeeEmail}, phone_number= #{employeePhoneNumber} WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId}
